docs.text: Installazione alpaka Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/alpaka-group/alpaka.git Installing boost (>1.74) TMP e' la cartella che e' stata creata dal comando mktemp -d mktemp -d curl -L -s -S https://boostorg.jfrog.io/artifactory/main/release/1.78.0/source/boost_1_78_0.tar.bz2 | tar xj -C TMP cd TMP/boost_1_78_0 ./bootstrap.sh ./b2 install --prefix=INSTALL_DIR --without-graph_parallel --without-mpi --without-python rm -rf TMP Installing gcc (> 9.5) In qyesto caso prendiamo gcc11 da cvmfs: source /cvmfs/sft.cern.ch/lcg/contrib/gcc/11.2.0/x86_64-centos7/setup.sh Compile examples Su cpu g++ -O2 -std=c++17 \ -DALPAKA_ACC_CPU_B_SEQ_T_SEQ_PRESENT -DALPAKA_ACC_CPU_B_SEQ_T_SEQ_ENABLED -DALPAKA_ACC_CPU_B_SEQ_T_SEQ_SYNC_BACKEND \ -isystem alpaka/include -isystem boost/include \ alpaka/example/monteCarloIntegration/src/monteCarloIntegration.cpp -o monteCarlo Su gpu invidia (cuda > 11.0) /usr/local/cuda-11.4/bin/nvcc -O2 -x cu \ -DALPAKA_ACC_GPU_CUDA_PRESENT -DALPAKA_ACC_GPU_CUDA_ONLY_MODE -DALPAKA_ACC_GPU_CUDA_ENABLED -DALPAKA_ACC_GPU_CUDA_ASYNC_BACKEND -UALPAKA_HOST_ONLY \ -isystem alpaka/include -isystem boost/include \ alpaka/example/monteCarloIntegration/src/monteCarloIntegration.cpp -o monteCarlo
